title: Project Configuration
description: Defines the bundles and list of externals for this project

entry.description: The path to JS file of the primary entry point for the bundle

manifest.description: The path to the Client-side Component Manifest for this bundle (optional)

outputPath.description: The path where the compiled bundle should be written

externals.description: A mapping of external bundles to the path to the bundled JS, used to create bundle config

oneOf.description: The path to the bundled external file

path.description: The path to the bundled external non-AMD file

globalName.description: The name of the global variable where an non-AMD dependency drops its exports

globalDependencies.description: List of non-AMD dependencies for this project

localizedResources.description: A set of localized resources, to be discovered following a specific pattern

^[a-zA-Z0-9\\.\\$_@/-]+$.description: The path to the localized resource file, relative to the root of the lib directory
